about_the_game:
Form a pact to save the one you love

The seven seas are ahead of you, full of pirates, dark magic, and the thrill of discovery.


Draco and the Seven Scales harkens back to an age of top down dungeon crawlers, full of items to collect, mighty bosses to overcome, and secrets lost for centuries to uncover.

Game Features

  • Classic top down dungeons, full of enemies, items, and puzzles.
  • A unique control scheme when sailing the seas with your crew.
  • The seven seas, all yours to explore. The way you progress the game can diverge. What is your unique path to sealing the dark pact?
  • A story of loss, desperation, and the places we go to save others.
  • Over 15 unique items to collect that assist in combat and puzzles.
  • Powerful ship upgrades, to further increase prowess over the seven seas.
  • Sail into shipwrecks, siren’s songs, and chart difficult waters never before explored in your quest for duty.
  • 7 dungeons to explore, filled with challenging bosses and minibosses.
  • Amazing pixel art that harkens back to a time long past, with an ever changing twist, developed by Manelzin.
  • A soundtrack that heightens the experience, heightening every twist and turn, composed by Tohomoko

short_description: Discover the mysteries of the great ocean in Draco and The Seven Scales! Explore dungeons, collect items, and fight scallywags on land and on the seven seas.
